attributes.action: Have a week break off school every fortnight
attributes.additional_details: I want this to go forward because school can get overwhelming sometimes therefore people start suffering from problems such as depression anxiety and many more
attributes.background: I want the government/parliament to have a week break off school every fortnight

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want schools to be required to close every other week, or to to close for one in three weeks.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
